title: Sport bike
des: Sport bikes are road bikes which emphasize top speed, acceleration, braking, handling and grip.

title: Muscle bike
des: s a nickname for a motorcycle type, derived from a sport bike design, that puts a disproportionately high priority on engine power.

title: Sport touring
des: Although any motorcycle can be equipped and used for touring, touring motorcycles are specifically designed to excel at covering long distances.

title: Dual-sport
des: Dual-sports, sometimes called dual-purpose or on/off-road motorcycles or adventure motorcycles, are street legal machines that are also designed to enter off-road situations.

title: Off-road
des: There are various types of off-road motorcycles, also known as dirt bikes, specially designed for off-road use. The term off-road refers to driving surfaces that are not conventionally paved.

title: Scooters
des: Motor scooters are in many cases classified as a separate vehicle to motorbikes, given their large amount of differences, and different evolution.
